name: Fabulous Food Truck
description: Fabulous Food Truck is an exciting time-management arcade game testing your skills and talent as Cook, Server and Manager of a busy food truck with a steady stream of demanding customers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 2 (SP2), Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: vCard with DirectX 9.0 support DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: vCard with DirectX 9.0 support DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Oh my god .. , this game is simulating a very old flash game 'Hot dog Bush' was my childhood literally xD  Anyway i got it with a bundle of 28 games for 1$ only , why not ;] much fun much wow. i love it
Direct mobile port for a quick cash grab.   -
